name: Healing Rift
description: Creates a healing circle that continuously regenerates health.

name: Empowering Rift
description: Creates an empowering circle that increases weapon damage.

name: Ionic Rift
description: Prismatic alternative. Creates an Arc discharge on impact with minor damage bonus.

name: Phoenix Dive
description: Rapid dive to the ground with healing or damage effect. Available on Solar and Prismatic subclasses.

name: Towering Barricade
description: Creates a large barrier that blocks damage.

name: Rally Barricade
description: Creates a small barrier that allows shooting over it.

name: Towering + Weapon Amp
description: Prismatic alternative. Combines protection with weapon amplification.

name: Marksman's Dodge
description: Dodge to automatically reload your weapon.

name: Gambler's Dodge
description: Dodge to recharge your melee ability.

name: Evasion Dodge
description: Prismatic alternative. Enhanced dodge with improved evasion capabilities.
